ProfessionalSummary:
Multidisciplinary visual designer who embues mindful,
empathetic sensibilities into the creative process.

Elucidates needs & desires then translates them into
meaningful insights, functionality & form.

Relies on research & data-driven decision making
to reach goals with tactical precision.

Delivery focused, adaptable & passionate.

Loves to learn, teach & be challenged by others.

Strong at thoughtfully communicating design intent -
both visually & verbally.


TOOLS & SKILLS

Photoshop • Illustrator • InDesign • Premiere • XD

HTML • CSS • Figma • Sketch • Principle • InVision

OmniGraffle • Balsamiq • Ableton Live • Logic Pro

Ethnography • Branding & Identity Development

Philosophy • User Research • Interaction Design
